casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony Lee MCNAIR 230P17-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 1, 2018

Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, For McNair, Anthony Lee.

Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, For State of North Carolina.

Anthony Lee McNair, For McNair, Anthony Lee.

Kimberly S. Robb, District Attorney, for the State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of November 2017 by Defendant for Final Defense:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of March 2018."
